attributes.action: honour Joanna Lumley in the New Years Honours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put forward Joanna Lumley to be made a Dame of the British Empire in the New Years Honours List.  Or at the very least and O.B.E.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
